backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining comprehensive healthcare platform types (professionals, hospitals, vendors, NGOs, medical records, research projects, tourism services) and data stores with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of AI chatbot widget on Contact page and Royal Teal/Royal White color theme update across the platform with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files including router configuration, dashboard, contact page with chatbot, legal pages, and Royal Teal color system implementation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, and UI component colors using grayscale values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AI Health Zon application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes including home, about, solutions, directory, careers, vendors, ambulance, NGOs, dashboard, contact, and legal pages with Layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: AI chatbot component with floating button, expandable chat interface, message history, and contextual responses about healthcare services, contact info, RCM, technology, network directory, careers, vendors, ambulance, and NGOs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with brand identity, social media links, quick links navigation, services menu, and legal links organized in a four-column responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component providing Navigation header, Outlet for page content, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Navigation component with responsive desktop/mobile menu, authentication controls, and dynamic nav links including a dashboard link for authenticated users. Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form component that collects user name and account type (hospital, professional, vendor, or NGO) for new users. Submits profile data via useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state, initializing with identity when authenticated or returning anonymous actor otherwise. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle. Provides authentication status flags and identity object to consuming components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, hospitals, healthcare professionals, vendors, and NGOs. Each hook uses the actor from useActor and manages query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors including primary, secondary, accent, destructive, and sidebar color schemes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Displays the About Us page with company mission, vision, core purpose, and benefits for hospitals, professionals, vendors, and patients. Includes sections for company overview, why choose us, and key statistics.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Provides ambulance service registration form and search functionality by location. Allows ambulance providers to register with service types (emergency, ICU, event) and displays filtered results of available ambulance services.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Career opportunities page with job application form for healthcare professionals. Supports CV upload with progress tracking and allows users to apply for various healthcare roles (doctors, nurses, admin staff, etc.).
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with contact form and company contact information (address, phone, email, WhatsApp). Includes a chatbot component and displays multiple contact methods for user support.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard that displays role-specific metrics and cards based on user type (hospital or professional). Shows ProfileSetup component if user profile doesn't exist, otherwise displays relevant statistics and management tools.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Displays a grid of 12 healthcare support categories (workforce, emergency, diagnostics, pharmacy, home care, mental health, vendors, NGOs, compliance, insurance, training, logistics) with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section introducing AI Health Zon platform, three verticals overview (RCM, Healthcare Tech, Connecting Platform), and CTAs for demo requests and network joining.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Searchable directory page that fetches and displays hospitals, vendors, and NGOs with filtering by category and location, showing contact details and entity information.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: NGO registration and listing page with form for adding new NGOs, displays community programs, and shows filtered list of registered NGOs by location and focus area.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining information collection, usage, sharing, security measures, and user rights with contact information.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Static refund policy page detailing eligibility, request process, processing times, non-refundable items, and cancellation terms.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: Solutions page displaying three main verticals (RCM, Healthcare Technology, Connecting Platform) with detailed feature cards, icons, and checkmark lists for each solution category.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Terms & Conditions page with a card layout displaying legal sections including acceptance of terms, use of services, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: Vendor registration page with a form for submitting vendor details (name, category, products, contact info, location), benefits section, and a list displaying all registered vendors with verification status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata documenting AI Health Zon as a multi-stakeholder healthcare platform with architectural notes, known issues (chatbot not functioning), and a comprehensive list of existing features mapped to requirements.
